discourse_list.title: ERC-1271: Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts - moving to Last Call

content.content: @PhABC submitted a PR to set ERC-1271’s status to “last call”.   github.com/ethereum/EIPs         Setting ERC-1271 to Last Call   ethereum:master ← PhABC:patch-8            opened 03:19PM - 05 Aug 20 UTC               PhABC             +1 -1             Ethereum Improvement Proposals    EIP 1271: Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts Details on Ethereum Improvement Proposal 1271 (EIP 1271): Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts      Also, to discuss on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pedrouid/status/1291068854995759106
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is submitting a PR to set ERC-1271's status to "last call" and is providing details on Ethereum Improvement Proposal 1271. The post also includes a link to discuss the proposal on Twitter. The post receives constructive criticism and questions from third parties, and some express interest in collaborating or advertising the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
